channel.title: Need help with my 517
channel.description:
Hi there guys! Well basically i need ALOT of help with a 517 im making. I am using a 517 source that starts in Varrock bank..i dont remember the name lol but it's pretty empty. So i just want to know ------
How do i add commands in a 517? E.G. which folder, what do i type, etc Does the Vuole Command Generator work with 317s only? How do i create a little box that shows all the commands? like ::commands How do i create messages to come up in the chat bar were people log in? sort of like "Welcome To Runescape" or whatever How do i make myself owner? how do i make people admins/mods/donator..w/e How do i make a new Home? what i mean is how do i set it so people log in in a certain place.. How do i add NPC's that respawn? How do i make NPC drops, max hits, etc How do i modify weapon max hits? And more questions i will edit later.
THANKS FOR WHOEVER CAN HELP ! :D

item.title: Need help with my 517
item.dc:creator: @12igon8 12igon8
item.description:
@12igon8 wrote:

to modify weapons i believe you go into items.java or itemdefinitions.java

item.title: Need help with my 517
item.dc:creator: @_Mark ``Mark
item.description:
@_Mark wrote:

How do i add commands in a 517? E.G. which folder, what do i type, etc - Commands.java
Does the Vuole Command Generator work with 317s only? - Not sure.
How do i create a little box that shows all the commands? like ::commands Are they in the quest tab? If not, is there any way that a window shops up? Use that.
How do i create messages to come up in the chat bar were people log in? sort of like “Welcome To Runescape” or whatever - TestWorldLoader (Not sure on name, I’m on a different computer.)
How do i make myself owner? how do i make people admins/mods/donator…w/e - Look at your name, and then find for .dat file, and edit it with WORDPAD only.) - rights must be 2.
How do i make a new Home? what i mean is how do i set it so people log in in a certain place… - Not sure, look at the player.java file maybe?
How do i add NPC’s that respawn? - Look at the NPC map.
How do i make NPC drops, max hits, etc - Same goes for NPC drops.
How do i modify weapon max hits? - Not sure.

Will edit if I find something incorrect. (When I’m on my own computer, that is… )

Read full topic
